channel.title: Kernel on Cloudware
channel.description: Recent content in Kernel on Cloudware

item.title: Docker In-Depth
item.description: Setup Ubuntu 18.04 Docker version 18.09.7, build 2d0083d containerd 1.2.6-0ubuntu1~18.04.2 runc version spec: 1.0.1-dev kervenl version: 5.3.0-61-generic Introduction Internals There are no such things as containers, Docker is only leveraging kernel feature called a namespace through different programs to give the illusion of container construct. Each namespace isolates a different dimension of the container and can be shared to other containers. Namespaces There are 5 namespaces involved in the container creation process
